description: Numbers n such that n^2 contains only digits {0,1,2}, not ending with zero.
links: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
P. De Geest, Index to related sequences
maple: R[1]:= {1,9};for m from 2 to 10 do  R[m]:= select(t -> max(convert(t^2 mod 10^m, base, 10)) <= 2, map(s -> seq(s + i*10^(m-1),i=0..9), R[m-1]))od:Res:= {seq(op(select(t -> t >= 10^(m-1) and max(convert(t^2,base,10)) <= 2, R[m])),m=1..10)}:sort(convert(Res,list)); # _Robert Israel_, Feb 23 2016
prog: (Python)A058411_list = [i for i in range(10**6) if i % 10 and max(str(i**2)) < '3'] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Feb 23 2016(PARI) isok(n) = (d = digits(n^2)) && (vecmax(d) <= 2) && d[#d]; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 24 2016(MAGMA) [n: n in [1..2*10^8 by 2] | Set(Intseq(n^2)) subset [0,1,2]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 24 2016
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 2000
